meanings.definition: The act of incorrectly identifying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Misidentifications can lead to confusion and misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The misidentifications of the suspect caused delays in the investigation.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the misidentifications of the characters added a comedic twist.
meanings.sent4: Her constant misidentifications of the twins made her the laughing stock of the school.
meanings.sent5: The misidentifications of the rare bird species by the amateur birdwatcher were quite embarrassing.

meanings.definition: Instances of mistakenly identifying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The misidentifications in the lineup led to the wrong person being arrested.
meanings.sent2: There were multiple misidentifications of the lost dog, causing confusion in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The misidentifications of the actors in the movie made it difficult to follow the plot.
meanings.sent4: The misidentifications of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a disastrous meal.
meanings.sent5: The misidentifications of the constellations by the amateur astronomer were quickly corrected by a professional.
